ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: The Order of THunder is not gotten by a quest. THe Medal of Merit is. And the Medal of Merit is still not No Drop. The ORder of Thunder was looted off Drosco,
ygData.messageBody:
The Order of THunder is not gotten by a quest. THe Medal of Merit
is. And the Medal of Merit is still not No Drop. The ORder of Thunder
was looted off Drosco, the zombie in the Qeynos sewers. (And maybe some of
the paladins around Qeynos. I never killed any)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: beatdropbattledrum@...
>[mailto:beatdropbattledrum@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 9:36 AM
>To: eqbards@egroups.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Re: Lambent Armor
>
>
>At one time, the Order of Thunder was tradeable. I completed that
>quest a looooong time ago and sold the Order of Thunder to an
>enchanter. Then they changed it to a NO DROP.
>
>~Beatdrop
>
>--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@e...>
>wrote:
>> That wasn't what he gave you, then. The Order of Thunder is No Drop.
>>
>> >-----Original Message-----
>> >From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@y...]
>> >Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 3:14 AM
>>
>> >A Troll warrior gave me one of these in WK several
>> >weeks ago. I was maybe lvl 15 at the time and really
>> >happy to get it. He said he looted it and didn't want
>> >it. I didn't ask at the time. Wish I had now.
>
>
